title: Ticket #1071: Unit test programs should be part of nightly builds/tests
description: Unit test programs (e.g., test_mystring) should be part of the nightly builds and tests. I guess a lot of these haven't been built for a while, because most of them do not build at all right now (undefined reference to `Sinful::addressPointsToMe(Sinful&)).
